idea: SKYWAY INDUSTRIAL FUEL PRIVATE LIMITED is having an online platform to provide doorstep delivery of fuel. idea: Xcelerate Fuelling Private Limited is a company which deals with the doorstep delivery of diesel to fulfill the requirement of diesel. The company is based in Mumbai, Maharashtra and directors are Kashyap Chandrakant Biyani Mob. No. â€“ 9819160878, mail id - kashyapsknowledge@gmail.com and Govinda Nagnathrao Sambutwad Mob. No. - 9773519000, mail id - gsambutwad@gmail.com. The concept is to deliver the diesel to doorstep to the required industries. Till date we are following the traditional process i.e., one has to go to fuel station and bring the diesel from the diesel station and store it in a container. So, it includes many losses. So we are coming up with the new technology that is delivery of diesel to your door step. In this we are having our highly safe diesel delivery tankers (Bowsers) which bring the diesel to your place by using a simple mobile application. This we will help to stop the loss which occurs due to old traditional method of fuel procurement.
name: XCELERATE FUELLING PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Suusst Brands Private Limited is a startup focussed on promoting ecofriendly and sustainable apparel and fashion habits among Indian consumers to help reduce human consumption related waste and contribute to reduction in global warming.
name: SUUSST BRANDS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Prive is an electric bike rental sharing platform for low distances.

As per the research peoples in urban cities travel less than 5 km for their work. And for that, they use either public transport or personal vehicles. 

Because of the covid-19, no one can want to travel through the public transports and increasing petrol prices can't afford the personal vehicles that's why we wanted to start the private bike-sharing platform and moreover, our bikes are electric so there is no harm to our mother earth. The other two reasons to start prive electric bike rental services is to help peoples in urban cities to manage their time for traveling and creating awareness of electric vehicles!
name: Prive

idea: Vidurpay is into contactless payments using low-cost wearables.
name: Vidurpay

idea:
A specialized laboratory dealing with histocompatibility and

Immunogenetics is of paramount importance to patients needing organ

transplantation, tissue grafts and bone marrow transplants including

cadaver transplantation.


The aim of our laboratory is to provide state of the art facilities and one

stop for all pre and post-transplant tests required to immune stratify a

patient and monitor post-transplant to pre-empt and treat immune events

which can be deleterious to an allograft.


The lab will carry out complete testing of the patient (recipient) and the

donor, give detailed interpretation of the tests findings and necessary

advice with comments to guide the clinicians to treat his/ her patient with

all relevant information. It will cater to all advanced investigations

available internationally to manage organ transplant patients.
name: ATDI LAB PRIVATE LIMITED
